price: 55. Marka waxaa ka mid ah mid rumeeyey (Nabi Muxammad), waxaana ka mid ah mid ka jeesada; Jahannama baana ku filan inay gubto.
arabic: فَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن صَدَّ عَنۡهُۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِجَهَنَّمَ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: famin'hum man āmana bihi wamin'hum man ṣadda ʿanhu wakafā bijahannama saʿīran
